name: Am I a Bad Soul?
description:
It is judgement day and you're a newly hired reaper admin and you're surrounded by lost (newly dead) souls! Nobody told you what you'd be doing but... you should probably walk around and talk to them. Figure out what they're like .. and ultimately, where they should go. You get to decide their ultimate fate with a stroke of a pencil! 

WASD to move
E to talk to the ghost
Left Click appropriate prompt for judgement

Refresh the page to try again and see the (1) other endings! 

HAVE FUN
